about_the_game:
Bring your game world to life in crisp pixel art with these RPG tiles. This pack includes new environment tiles for cold areas such as a winter forest, ice cave and snow village.

Created in the iconic retro style of Time Fantasy series, this fun-sized pack is a great addition to your growing RPG Maker library.

Features:
  • New tiles to expand on the Time Fantasy style.
  • Autotile terrain, including animated water for different ground types.
  • TileA5 wall tiles for exterior cliffs as well as icey caverns.
  • Three object-layer tile sheets (winter wilderness/snow cave, tree/forest and snow town).
  • For use with RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Time Fantasy: Winter Tiles" and "RPG Maker MV - Time Fantasy: Winter Tiles" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
